intro: Psychotria diffusiflora, commonly known as the spreading psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant features elliptical leaves with a glossy surface and produces small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. Its fruit is a small, smooth, yellowish drupe that contains a single seed. Psychotria diffusiflora is often found in lowland rainforests and is adapted to nutrient-poor soils.
